attributes.review: This app has ruined my life. My great great grandfather asked me to get it for him so I did. I opened the app and received a high voltage shock. It kept spamming. Me with notifications till I payed 5$. Then they sent the fbi to my house to inspect all my devices. They took my sister away for testing and sent my dad to jail. Then they raided the house for all the money.
attributes.title: Cancel Trump 2020

attributes.review: This app is the worst in existence I can't believe people voted for him when o opened the app spiders and bee's started swarming me like it was a built in hex it plays horrible music as soon as you open the horrendous app it's like Donald trump wants us to Download the app so it puts in fake votes in the near election I hate this app and it needs to be deleted.
attributes.title: Hate this and him

attributes.review: This app wouldn’t download for days and it will take a lot of my battery percentage I noticed that my phone would get hot since the day It started to download I wouldn’t be using my phone at it would go from 100% to 60% in 30 minutes
attributes.title: If I could rate this less then a star I would

attributes.review: I am a true rightist and I believe White lives matter also! I couldn’t express my overwhelming feelings because this app was incredibly laggy!!! I couldn’t get through the directory or even look at My president Trumps excerpts. This app even closed out a few times and I made me very upset that I had to punch holes in my dry wall. FIX THIS APP SO I CAN SUPPORT MY PRESIDENT TRUMP MAGA2020 WHITELIVESMATTER
attributes.title: App lags

attributes.review: The app is so bad it won’t even let my phone download it at first.i just wanted to see what was up but it’s trash,trash is all I can say this app needs to be taken down right now my baby started crying when she say a big orange face pop out of my screen with I opened the app this add is horrible.
attributes.title: Trash like trump

attributes.review:
I opened the app I saw such a ugly creature like orange with Blonde hair😹it burned my eyes so bad I needed to go to the hospital😜please please please don’t get this app it is so terrible😣it lagged my phone out so much I had to take it to the Apple store as well with that being said this app is nothing but trouble and I do not recommended😌

attributes.title: Burned my eyes

attributes.review: I almost died while using this app, yes, it’s true. While I was walking downstairs one day. I started reading up on it when all of a sudden I started chocking on all the BS. I passed out and broke my lungs which sent me to the doctors. I was put into a coma. In fact I still am in the coma. Oh no! I’m flat lining at this insta-......
attributes.title: This totally wasn’t because of Tik Tok 😉

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! Not only does it take a ridiculously long  amount of time, but it goes through all of your personal information! It glitches out and doesn’t even work half the time! Only get it if you’re really into having people steal your information and crash your devices!!! Xoxo!
attributes.title: DONT. DO. IT

attributes.review: It would barely let me into the app. The same way that Trump barely makes sense. And every-time I would be able to do something. It would glitch like a mother trucker and just close the app. So unbelievably annoying. DEFINITELY do not download!!! Don’t want viruses in your phone now do you?
attributes.title: Literally so horrible

attributes.review: l was walking my goldfish like usual and then a car crash 😲!! my goldfish was pronounced DEAD!! i asked why was he driving so carelessly and they said cuz he was checking the news from our “presidents” crummy app! so i checked the app to see if it was even all that interesting... guess what, IT ISNT! no video games on here at all so so boring! trump 2020 on a gravestone❤️ 🚫👄🚫!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS GARBAGE!!
